item.description:
Providence 375 Walking Tours .

Presented by Providence Foundation at Downtown Providence June 9-September 8, 2011 The Rhode Island Historical Society and The Providence Foundation have partnered to organize FREE downtown walking tours following the 4 celebration themes. The walks will take place at noon on the 2nd Thursday of the month, June through September. Each tour will last one hour.

The dates and themes are as follows:

August 11: ROOTS

September 8: INGENUITY

Tickets: Free

Phone: 401-331-8575
item.name: Providence 375 Walking Tours
